story_13_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I can’t accept this...
There must be some mistake.
story_13_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You’re all really strong, aren’t you.
Even my Lapras’s Blizzard couldn’t
put out the fire in your hearts.
story_13_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
But now that you beat us, I expect you to keep on
winning! You owe us that much, right?
story_13_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Well? How was your first taste of the
strength of a dragon master!
story_13_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
You felt it, didn’t you? The energy that my
presence brings to this competition!
We can’t let that end here!
story_13_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: So...I suppose I can lend your team a hand!
story_13_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
S-say something!
You’re not actually thinking of refusing, are you?!
story_13_03000/2401_1001_1600_10: You really are fun to watch, aren’t you, Clair.
story_13_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
That does sound like an interesting idea, though.
What do you say? Could you take Clair along
with you?
story_13_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
She might be a little...eccentric, as you can see,
but you can count on her. I guarantee it.
story_13_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
You don’t have to shoulder this alone, Clair.
Aim for the top together, with a new team.
story_13_03000/2401_1001_2100_10:
That is...if you ever want to be as strong as
Lance, of course.
story_13_03000/2401_1001_2300_10:
O-of course I do... And besides, I already
surpass Lance when it comes to battle skills!
story_13_03000/2401_1001_2400_10:
You’ll see! Now that you’ll be in the crowd,
I hope you watch me more closely.
story_13_03000/2401_1001_2500_10: Thank you. I’ll do my best for the both of us.
story_13_03000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Don’t worry, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You can
rest assured with Kingdra and I on the team.
story_13_03000/2401_1001_2800_10:
I, the greatest dragon master of all time,
shall tip the scales in our favor!
